body.name: Dove Refillable Deodorant Starter Kit Deodorant For Women Cucumber & Green Tea 0% Aluminum 1.13 oz
features: REFILLABLE DEODORANT STARTER KIT: Dove proudly introduces their first refillable deodorant, the starter kit contains a reusable, stainless steel case and one deodorant refill
BUY ONCE REFILL FOR LIFE: Once your deodorant runs out, simply place a new refill onto the stainless steel base, twist and click and you’re good to go again
KIND TO SKIN: Women's deodorant without aluminum contains ¼ moisturizers to care for your underarms
CARING FORMULA: Alcohol free deodorant and aluminum free deodorant formula with glycerin for smooth skin
EFFECTIVE ODOR PROTECTION: This deodorant for women provides 48-hour deodorant protection against odor
LONG-LASTING FRESHNESS: Moisturizing deodorant for women with a refreshing cucumber and green tea scent
body.description: Find yourself throwing away an empty deodorant month after month? Join the deodorant revolution with Dove Refillable Deodorant. Our stainless steel refillable deodorant is designed to buy once and refill for life with our first lifetime guaranteed* case and our 98% recycled plastic refills to keep your deodorant fresh. Each kit contains one reusable deodorant container, and one refill in our refreshing cucumber and green tea scent. Perfect for a morning pick-me-up, the juicy fragrance will delight your senses and give a long-lasting fresh feeling all day. Plus, our stick aluminum free formula is enriched with ¼ moisturizers and glycerin for skin that feels smooth and nourished, giving you up to 48 hour deodorant effective protection against odor. For best results, apply our aluminum free deodorant for women to clean dry underarms. Swipe it across your skin two or three times until an even layer has been applied. Once your refill runs out, simply place a new one onto the stainless steel base, twist and click – and you’re good to go again. Don’t forget to recycle the refill plastic pack. Dove is on a mission to help reduce waste around the world, from using alternative materials to creating packaging innovations like Dove Refillable deodorant. *Lifetime guarantee applies to stainless steel case only (refills excluded) and is valid for as long as the product is actively distributed to retailers.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #28,364 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #346 in Deodorant

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: How does your refillable routine work? First, purchase the Refillable Deodorant Starter Kit, containing the refillable stainless steel case and one deodorant refill. Once your deodorant runs out, you can buy Dove Refill Kits which each contain two deodorant refills. Durable stainless steel case, designed to last for life In order to fulfil its promise of ‘buy once, refill for life,’ the refillable case is made from super-durable stainless steel, designed to last. Caring 0% aluminum formula with glycerin for smooth skin Dove refill sticks contain our aluminum free deodorant formula that cares for your underarm skin, formulated with ¼ moisturizers and glycerin for skin that’s soft and smooth. Plus, it keeps you odour free with 48 hour protection, leaving you feeling fresh all day long. Explore the Dove Refillable range Available in multiple fragrances, you can choose which scent best suits you. Opt for Cucumber & Green Tea for a refreshing fragrance, or Coconut & Pink Jasmine to add a subtle floral flourish to your day. If you have sensitive skin, look out for our sensitive deodorant stick which has a gentle hypoallergenic scent.

Dove Refillable Deodorant Cucumber & Green Tea Starter Kit Dove Refillable Deodorant Coconut & Pink Jasmine Starter Kit Dove Refillable Deodorant Sensitive Starter Kit Fragance refreshing, uplifting blend delicately floral scent refreshing, uplifting blend 0% Aluminum Formula ✓ ✓ ✓ Hypoallergenic x x x Stainless steel case ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewerName: Gabriel Ruas Santos RochaGabriel Ruas Santos Rocha
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Innovative, Presentable, and Powerful!
reviews.reviewText: This is definitely a great and innovative product. I’ve owned the men’s version of this (grey lid instead of white) for some time now and not only does the deodorant stick stay put and can be used up until the bitter end. The scents are great, the packaging is visually pleasing and durable, guaranteeing this can truly last for a lifetime. The only problem I’ve been having is that unfortunately the refill cartridges are not that widely available, and I live in Los Angeles which is a pretty major market, imagine in smaller cities? Even Amazon has limited availability of this product. Target, in all of Los Angeles, only sells the refills in three stores. It’s kind of crazy to me that Dove would launch such a great product with so little support for it and close to no advertising. I have a feeling this will be obsolete very soon, unfortunately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to love this and cut down on the amount of plastic waste that I am contributing to our environment. I do like the metal container. It feels nice in your hand. The design looks nice too.I opened the actual deodorant piece and put it in place. It was somewhat difficult to open and I noticed that it comes in a hard plastic package?! It twists onto the base and the plastic is discarded.The second time I used the deodorant stick, it broke completely off of the base at the very bottom. I now have a slippery bar of gooey deodorant and a nice paperweight.I am going to have to go out and buy more deodorant because this is completely unusable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Good Concept, Flawed Design & Excecution
reviews.reviewText: While I love the concept of having a refillable option, this is not the green solution that's being marketed. Each refill is encompassed by a plastic shell and the deodorant portion easily breaks away from the base with pressure from use. I've lost a few refills already with reasonable pressure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great concept, questionable product
reviews.reviewText: I have been housing the Dove aluminum free deodorant in the Jasmine scent for years. I recently switched over to the refill concept to save money and encourage recycling. For those two reasons this product is great. It is a small, sleek compact design great for putting in a gym bag or on the go. The aluminum container is very protective of the product.Unfortunately for me I can no longer use this product because I developed what I imagine is some form of allergy. I am notorious for having sensitive skin. Like I said before I’ve been using this product for years, it wasn't till recently that my armpits became red and irritated. Making my skin very sore to touch and impossible to put product on. Time to time I would notice small lumps formed under my skin. They didn’t hurt but we’re still noticeable. I know that this is an issue very specific to me but I advise people with sensitive skin to find an alternative deodorant. Otherwise this was a great product. Smells good and lasts all day. It doesn’t have a chalky feeling and applies very smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have been using this product since it came out. I have never had a stick break on me. I’m not even sure what one would have to do to make that happen. Perhaps different scents behave in different ways. I have always used the green tea scent. I used to use the same scent back before the aluminum free refillable ones came out. Have always loved the smell and was very glad to have this aluminum free, refillable alternative. Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Breaks off easily, then unusable
reviews.reviewText: The deodorant stick is fully extended once attached to the applicator. This makes it vulnerable to breaking off. This has happened twice to me, out of 3 sticks. Won't be buying this again. Its expensive, and a terrible design. So, ultimately not eco-friendly at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 30, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to LOVE it
reviews.reviewText: So My daughter has been on me to try an all natural deodorant. I seen this on Amazon and got excited because I love Dove products and I really liked the idea of saving plastic. This product smells great an I love the refillable option. Mine broke as others mentioned about on about the tenth day. I now just hold it in my hand and continue to use it, this is a bit of a pain but I wanted to give the product itself a chance.I will say I am struggling at the end of the day with odor, but this is to be expected when switching to aluminum free, which is why I wanted to try it before the heat set in. I've read that it can take several weeks to get your armpits aclamated to the natural deodorant. So products broke, but smells great, leaves my armpits soft but sadly still stinky. I'll update after a month if anything had changed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: If you compare how much is left in a regular stick before it falls apart and all that you really don't waist much of anything with this one and it's small enough to just toss in your bag and go anywhere

Es muy buena iniciativa de tener un desodorante cómodo de aplicar y cuyo empaque no se tire, por lo que me arriesgué a pesar de las reseñas, pero me pasó lo mismo que a muchos. Hay que usarlo con mucho cuidado y en un ángulo específico para que la barra no se rompa. El primer día que lo usé con prisa, se rompió la barra y es imposible devolverla a la base. Definitivamente no vale el precio, y el empaque es muy pesado. Ojalá se recicle o saquen repuestos compatibles con mejor diseño.

reviews.reviewTitle: bad design and unusable. Waste of $
reviews.reviewText: Great concept but unusable. dont waste money- break off after couple of uses- Top cover doesnt fix with the base and falls off easily
